items.question: What video formats are supported for enhancement?
items.answer: We support all major video formats including MP4, AVI, and MOV. Ensure your video is of good quality prior to enhancement for best results.

items.question: Can I enhance multiple videos at once?
items.answer: Yes! Our platform supports batch processing allowing you to enhance several videos simultaneously for increased efficiency.

items.question: How long does the enhancement process take?
items.answer: Most enhancements are completed within minutes, but processing time may vary depending on video length and selected quality settings.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many times I can use the service?
items.answer: No limits! You can enhance as many videos as you need at your convenience, with pricing based only on usage.

items.question: Do enhanced videos include commercial licensing?
items.answer: Yes! All enhanced videos come with full commercial rights for usage in marketing and personal projects.

items.question: What support is available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: We provide thorough documentation, FAQs, and a support team accessible via live chat and email for any technical challenges.

items.question: How does the pricing work for video enhancements?
items.answer: Our pricing is pay-as-you-go, so you pay only for the enhancements you perform. No subscriptions or hidden fees are involved.

items.question: Can I expect a preview before finalizing enhancements?
items.answer: Absolutely! You will see a preview of enhancements before downloading the final video, ensuring satisfaction with the outcome.

items.question: What are the best use cases for the AI Video Enhancer?
items.answer: This tool is ideal for businesses creating promotional content, influencers enhancing videos for social media, and educators upgrading online course materials.

items.question: Will the service keep my videos private?
items.answer: Yes, all uploaded videos are securely processed and will not be shared with third parties without your consent.
